item.title: How the FUCK can my colleagues sense that i am...off? — 50 replies — 200.0/hr
item.content:encoded:

Open thread • Replies: 50 • Updated: 2026-02-27 18:50 UTC

OP

How the FUCK can my colleagues sense that i am...off? I thought i was acting normalfag and friendly.. is it my eyes or what? Or is it because i'm single? Fuck waging. I hope whoever slighted me dies slow and in extreme pain. Does anybody know this feel?

Early replies (first 3)

61907359
>>61907350
normies are very good at detecting autism, they have a 99%+ accuracy rate

61907374
Its because youre single and a man. Single women are treated fine but single men are treated like homosexuals and rapists. Fuck this society

61907379
>>61907350
The trick is to not really hide the crazy
They're programmed to kind of like lunatics so long as you don't fully let go, and so long as you aren't incredibly hideous or uncharismatic

Latest replies (last 30, oldest → newest)

61908493
>>61907385
Because we used to be their overlords in ancient societies. People with autism and the best overseers of golden age civilizations.

Jewish psychopaths are the antagonist of us autists and have taken over as the overlords and have made it their mission to program the normies to hate us because we are the biggest threat to world Jewry

61908514
I'm a 3 usually but became a 5 for a few days until they shipped me off to the funny farm

Only way for non-neurotypicals to unironically make it (not have a black nurse when we are on death's door) is to start your own business. Yes your business can be trading but if you do you have to take it seriously and stop gambling with your main bucket

61908567
Why is all of Gen Z number 4?
Also OP, you can tell if someone gooned recently. Normies don't know what they are sensing but I know that sense.

61908601
>>61908479
Faggot

61908672
>>61908493
So sad Germany lost WW2 I curse those British and American cucks for putting us in this hell ruled by the juice.

61908673
>>61907350
you have to love yourself, you can't trick the soul matrix system genuinely love yourself and the matrix will love you back unironically - they can sense your arrogant aura and your inner toxicity normies aren't dumb they're acting subconsciously they feel what they feel but they don't even realise it they still feel it though

61908726
>>61907350
Fucking manager asked me to “open up more” for the 5th time this year. Like nigger get a fucking clue. I don’t want to be a normalfag.

61908866
>>61907350
I hope your situation greatly improves, soon. I haven't experienced what you have so far. Tend to avoid joking/teasing at the expense of others, even the light kind other people in their life do, fully expecting that jokes/teases will be made about them. Apparently this makes me seem strangely, even suspiciously nice. Tend to tell people I've seen how jokes/teases can come to mind again and contribute to a person's doom spiral. I've seen people behind doom spiral just by talking while the rest listened. After that they usually get why I watch my words.

61909198
>>61908514
Good image.

61909269
>>61908726
"I have an extraordinarily stimulating home, family, and social life outside of work, and I try to support and bring a focused atmosphere in the office."

The clique at the office is toxic. It doesn't matter how nice and inclusive they are on the outside, the point of being in their little in-group is so they feel accepted and trusted by you, so they can strategize around what vulnerabilities they learn about you through "socialization"
It's also important to realize the clique at the office will not be composed of the most senior and productive workers. It will be largely "new" people to the corporation, who are trying to compound and roll the freshman happy-go-lucky "I made it" vibes perpetually.
Unfortunately, being a simpleton and going with the crowd at work is a way to reduce your own role, executive actions, and relevance in your life. If 20 people have to walk together and get coffee every day because.. it's what they do...they're essentially automatons, preprogrammed. If you're forced to walk at an uncomfortably brisk pace to keep up with the lead Alpha Team Member on your walks, you're being actively cucked

OP, you should be satisfied in knowing you don't fit in. You probably don't want to fit in.

61909282
>>61907350
I have a fairly unfriendly face. Keeps me from ever moving up.

61909303
>>61907350
Normalfags at work don't seem to like that I need peace and quiet to do work (I usually like to find a nice chill spot to code) and they say I'm not a "cultural fit". Pretty gay and retarded if you ask me desu.

61910258
>>61907350
It's your bodylangage. You are uptight. And tense. Alert in a way. That scream insecurities.
Seeing your post, plan to isolate from normies in the future. Solitary job or financial independance. You are too far gone. It's not a bad thing by the way.

61910271
>>61908726
>I don’t want to be a normalfag.
So don't work in an office.
Do a SOLITARY job. Yes, they exist. And if you cannot find one with enough imagination, guess what, you have a little bit of normalfagging in you.

61910291
>>61908866
Normies do not understand irony. So it's useless using irony with them, in order to subtetly pass as the smart guy. Do not joke with them. Always take them seriously. They do not want to think. To learn, to understand. They want to have immediate pleasure. Eating. Drinking. Go away for the week end. Never talk to them about profound subject. Never talk to them about politics. In fact, only talk to them about the most basic shit.

61910319
>>61908567
>Why is all of Gen Z number 4?
They're all unironically retarded. It's probably a mix of 1 & 4, bad eyelid genes, accelerated aging, and being high. Simple interactions stress them, they're like chihuahuas.

That too.

61911937
you are probably an annoying asshole who makes comments and gives opinions where none is wanted, and laugh at inappropriate times. If you are looksmaxxed and do this, normies will think you are annoying but will tolerate you. If you are sub 5 and do this, its a death sentence

item.content:encoded:

Open thread • Replies: 33 • Updated: 2026-02-27 18:34 UTC

OP

BUY EVERYTHING WITH CASH ONLY

SAY NO TO DEBT

SAY NO TO MORTGAGE

Early replies (first 3)

61905088
as a matter of fact DONT BUY ANYTHING
save EVERYTHING

61905096
>>61905079
Based. If you have consumer debt you are absolutely and unequivocally poor.

61905191
>>61905096
This. You bought latest iPhone? You’re poor!

Latest replies (last 30, oldest → newest)

61905232
>>61905096
The rate on my mortgage that I got in 2020 is now lower than the rate I can get from a HYSA.
I get 3% cash back on every credit card purchase I make and pay 0% interest. Whenever I get a new credit card, I usually get a $200 bonus cash back, plus 0% APR for 12+ months.
Low/no interest debt is fucking awesome. You are a retard who sucks at math and long term planning.

61905243
>>61905079
Have literally done all of this. Just on a smaller scale. My home and land are paid for(besides taxes), only 1 acre, manufactured home. I bought my truck 10 years ago cash, I still drive it every day. I have 1 credit card for "emergencies", I dont have to work and I can smoke weed all day. I'm as happy as I can imagine, but by any standard I'm poor

61905249
>>61905079
This guys advice seems to stem from assuming everyone is a nigger.

61907660

RICE AND BEANS

SELL THE KIDS

BETTER THAN I DESERVE

61907724
>>61905079

61907745
>>61907724

61907808
>>61905079
>retarded boomer gives incredibly dumb financial advice to other retarded boomers who somehow managed to be poor despite working in the single most prosperous time period in the history of the fucking world

61907901
>>61905232

61908024
>>61905079
>CASH ONLY
you mean your worthless papers that are spawned into existence through usury itself?

Nah thanks, I'll just keep making thousands churning credit cards. never once carried a balance or paid interest cause im not a retarded nigger. later boomer

61908034
>>61905088
How much debt you in bud? Don't be mad at Dave cuz he's old school.

61908045
>>61905232
No one ever got rich from credit card perks. I'm not arguing that interest-free debt is cool but don't act like credit cards are how you get wealthy.

61908654
>>61905079
Horrible advice. Buy with credit cards that offer rewards, then pay them off in full every month before due date. Im up to 40 dols in cashback rewards just using cards instead of my debit, then paying off the bill with money I was going to use to buy the stuff in the first place. Literal free money and my credit score has been soaring. Fuck wish id done this a decade ago.

61908821
>>61905079
People meme on Dave a lot but I don't think he's that bad, I just don't think Dave is really meant for people who can control their spending. If you even somewhat understand money and you have a healthy savings account, good 401k, and don't have a ton of debt you aren't his target audience. His target audience is people who -
>are 21-50 years old
>have a $1.5k a month car loan for 84 months
>buy Labubus and other weird shit
>can't control their spending
>have 5 credit cards
>have no savings or long term investments
>make $15 an hour

61908832
>>61908654
that's the thing though, these people CANNOT control their spending. That's why giving them credit cards is a bad idea and why he says not to get them. If you know how you use a credit card IE just use it like a debit card, don't finance expensive shit or max it out, then you're fine. You gotta remember the people who need his advice probably have like sub 600 credit and ridiculous interest rates.

61908860
>>61908832
Yea. Ive come to understand as I get older peoples choices are the prime factor in their situation and bad luck is just a cope they console themselves with.

61908878
>>61908821
This anon gets it.

61909951
>>61908821
his videos have like millions of views, I wonder if theres that many people who are bad with finances

61909964
>>61905079
shit i realized when i was sixteen for 500, Alex

61909987
>>61907808
There's always a cheap asset that's an "obvious buy" looking back, no one can predict the future.

Buy platinum.

61910179
shit, my earning didn't outpace inflation. I'm now worse off than i was due to asset prices increasing before i could buy.

61911929
I’ve opened my first savings account few days ago I already have $30 saved.

I’m literally taking baby steps

61911936
>>61905079
Good luck buying a home. Or a non-shitbox car. Credit is fake and gay but its sadly reality.

61911940
>every single day talking to retards who spend 1k+ a month on their pickup truck
>or women who think they should sign for loans because their boyfriend has bad credit

You'd simplify your lesson really fast too

61912125
>>61908045
The mindset counts for something. I've churned through a few dozen of the credit card bonuses. Practically speaking, it's pocket change in the grand scheme of things. But it's one of many financially health habits that allowed me to get rich and retire early.

61912248
>>61909951
young people are generally very bad with money. A lot of people don't start saving until they're like 30+. I think the average savings in the US for Gen Z workers is $1000. So yes, there's a lot of people who are horrible with money. Financial classes should be a requirement in high schools.

First time homeowner. Never did crypto, not my game. All advice I can give you is buy precious metals and commodities. Also CD's are based. I've escaped rentoid hell. I'm out, and I'll never return. Good luck fags, I wish you the best. Low ball these boomer fucks.

When I paid rent that money went into a black hole, now I have house equity. One day I will stop paying mortgage, and only pay property tax. Rent hell this would never happen

Yeah, I did that while renting. I had shit landlords that refused to fix things correctly. But now I have knowledge of fixing shit

The dichotomy between NEETs and wagies is a false one
On the one hand the NEET is completely right that labor within modern institutions is conditioning the mind to slavish servitude, and that most profit of the labor is sluiced off to parasites engineering the destruction of mankind.
On the other hand, the wagie is correct that man and labor are interconnected and that man was not designed for laziness but is an inherently active and industrious creature.
The true synthesis of this false dichotomy is the self-sufficient man, the man of the land, he that owns the most primary means of survival and labors to scrape a living off of bare rocks if fate demands it, beholden to none but the physical realities resulting from his own toil
He is the Yeoman, the Free Farmer, the true synthesis of man's need to work and man's rejection of Servitude.
the Yeoman's Republic as America was meant to be, as Jefferson dreamt of; a nation of free farmers united in love for liberty and justice, and rejection of servitude in any form.

Reject the false dichotomy, acquire the land and never sell. Eat worms (eat ze bugz) if you have to, as long as they are YOUR worms on YOUR land.
